references.paper_title: Learning a deep convolutional network for image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper is foundational for deep learning-based image super-resolution, a key component in many image restoration tasks and the base for several models mentioned in AdaptIR.

references.paper_title: Beyond a gaussian denoiser: Residual learning of deep CNN for image denoising
references.reason: This work is highly influential in deep learning-based image denoising, another core image restoration problem addressed by AdaptIR.

references.paper_title: All-in-one image restoration for unknown corruption
references.reason: This paper presents a significant step towards generalized image restoration, which AdaptIR aims to improve upon with its parameter-efficient approach.

references.paper_title: The power of scale for parameter-efficient prompt tuning
references.reason: This is a highly influential paper in Parameter-Efficient Transfer Learning (PETL), which AdaptIR leverages for its parameter-efficient model adaptation, inspiring the core methodology of AdaptIR.

references.paper_title: Adapt-Former: Adapting vision transformers for scalable visual recognition
references.reason: This work is another important contribution to PETL and demonstrates an effective method for adapting vision transformers, which are also used as base models in AdaptIR.
